titleInfo.title: 'Bodyguard of Mailed Sowars, Koweit.' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:145 x 204 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘19’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView of a group of sowars or mounted escorts or guards. The title presumably refers to chain-mail worn by the soldiers (visible in the helmet worn by the man third from left).InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Bodyguard of Mailed Sowars, Koweit.'Pencil, lower right, alongside image: ‘19’
